class src.IOT_OCTscanSegmentation.IOT_OCTscanSegmentation(*args)[source]¶

Bases: object

A retinal layer segmentation over a IOT_OCTscan

A retinal layer segmentation over a IOT_OCTscan. A segmentation assigns every pixel of the scan a class label.

Please note that this is a data model class; it keeps the segmentation but it is NOT capable of “computing” such segmentation. To compute a segmentation please refer to IOT_OperationSegmentation.

The segmentation is sized and shaped equal to its base IOT_OCTscan.

A default segmentation sets the whole segmentation to BACKGROUND.

See also

IOT_OCTscan, IOT_OperationSegmentation

Note

None

classMap¶

The map of classes.

The map of classes; the list of class names associated to each value in the segmentation map.

Getter:Gets the base OCT scan
Setter:Sets the base OCT scan
Type:IOT_OCTscan
clear()[source]¶

Clears/Resets the segmentation map to _BACKGROUND.

Clears/Resets the segmentation map to _BACKGROUND. All pixels are assigned the background label.

data¶

The segmentation labels map. Please refer to classMap for classes.

..note: WARNING! This method is not currently checking whether the
data is sized equal to the scan. This may become a problem later. The problem is that trying to check scan.shape will raise an error during object creation, when attemting to set the data but because the object has not been created yet, it still lacks the scan property even if declared in advance.
Getter:Gets the segmentation map
Setter:Sets the segmentation map
Type:numpy.ndarray shaped [width,height]
getClassName()[source]¶

Get the class name as a string.

Get the class name as a string.

Returns:The class name.
Return type:string
scan¶

The base OCT scan. Please refer to data for the segmentation map.

Setting a new base scan resets/clears the current segmentation.

Getter:Gets the base OCT scan
Setter:Sets the base OCT scan
Type:IOT_OCTscan
shape¶

The scan segmentation shape [width,height].

Getter:Gets the scan segmentation shape
Setter:None. This is a read-only property.
Type:Tuple [width,height]
